title: Simulating the Principles of the Smallest Blockchain
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Simulate the principles of the smallest blockchain in your familiar language, including two functions:
1. POW proves the generation of blocks, with a difficulty of starting with 4 zeros
2. Each block contains `previous_hash` to link the blocks together.

Below is a reference block structure:

```json
block = {
'index': 1,
'timestamp': 1506057125,
'transactions': [
    { 'sender': "xxx", 
    'recipient': "xxx", 
    'amount': 5, } ], 
'proof': 324984774000,
'previous_hash': "xxxx"
}
```

Please **submit the link to the completed GitHub code repository**, including running instructions and running logs or screenshots in the Readme.

description: Understand the proof of work and chain structure of blockchain through practice.
